page.title: 20Religion.
page.content:
{Father Caute}
Father Caute became a vicar because he felt God wanted himto be.He has been a vicar for eighteen years.He had to study for two terms to become a vicar Father Caute enjoys his job.When he was younger,he wanted to be a missionary,a person who travels around the world teaching people about God. He is the vicar at the Church of the Good Shepherd which shares its facilities with the Cox Green Community Centre.It is an Anglican Church. { {Other Churches}that exist within the community include a Methodist Chapel and a Baptist Church.
